summary: Netflix guided Q1 2026 revenue to $12.157B vs Q1 2025 actual $10.543B, implying 15.3% YoY growth. Full-year 2026 guidance is 12-14% growth. Netflix tends to beat guidance by ~0.5-1%.
content:
Key data points:
- Q1 2025 actual revenue: $10.543B (13% YoY growth at the time)
- Q4 2025 actual revenue: $12.051B (17.6% YoY growth)
- Full year 2025 revenue: $45.2B (17% growth)
- Netflix Q1 2026 guidance: $12.157B revenue, $3.264B profit, 32.1% operating margin
- Full year 2026 guidance: $50.7-51.7B (12-14% growth, decelerating)
- Netflix beat Q4 2025 guidance by ~0.75% ($12.05B vs $11.96B guided)
- Ad revenue topped $1.5B in 2025 (2.5x YoY), targeting $3B in 2026
- 325M+ paid members milestone
- Warner Bros acquisition announced (all-cash bid)
- Price increases implemented Jan 2025 now fully in comparables

At guidance: 15.3% YoY growth
At 0.75% beat (matching Q4 pattern): ~16.0% YoY growth
Downside (miss by 1%): ~14.2% YoY growth
Upside (2% beat): ~17.6% YoY growth
